subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers was sharp on offense, punishing on defense and insistent that Brian Leonard, the fifth-year senior fullback and team captain, leave in style in his last game in Rutgers Stadium. Rutgers won, 38-7, and Leonard had a dream day.
snippet: Rutgers was sharp on offense, punishing on defense and insistent that Brian Leonard, the fifth-year senior fullback and team captain, leave in style in his last game in Rutgers Stadium. Rutgers won, 38-7, and Leonard had a dream day.
